criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Tristian has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Tristian’s personal biases, one of Tristian’s resistances, or one of Tristian’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Tristian has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Tristian’s personal biases, one of Tristian’s resistances, or one of Tristian’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Tristian is susceptible to flattery when actually Tristian is resistant to flattery.
